original_text: Jonah stayed inside a big fish for three days and three nights. In the same way, the Son of Man will remain in the ground for three days and three nights.
korean_text: 요나가 밤낮 사흘 동안 큰 물고기 뱃속에 있었던 것 같이 인자도 밤낮 사흘 동안 땅 속에 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Jonah stayed inside a big fish
for three days and three nights
the Son of Man will remain in the ground
for three days and three nights
